Name: Night Cap
Ingredients: 1 cube Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (flamed).
Dash bitters over sugar cube in base of mixing glass.
Add hot water, crush cube with muddler and stir to dissolve sugar.
Add brandy and STIR with ice
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: Diluted brandy with the orange zest twist adding much of the flavour.
History: Adapted from a 2015 recipe by Gregory Goins at BO Beau Kitchen & Roof Tap in Long Beach, California.
